entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
